abstract: Wal-Mart seeks a majority stake in Massmart, the South African retail chain with which it aims to tap growth on the continent.
snippet: Wal-Mart seeks a majority stake in Massmart, the South African retail chain with which it aims to tap growth on the continent.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart, looking to tap growth in Africa, said on Monday that it had made a formal offer of about 17 billion rand ($2.4 billion) for a majority stake in Massmart, the South African retail chain.
